Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1521 WESTBRANCH DRIVE,SUITE 100, MCLEAN, Virginia, 22102, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Gladstone Land Corp is an externally-managed, agricultural REIT. It is primarily in the business of owning and leasing farmland. It manages operations in one reporting segment. It is focused on the ownership of high-quality farms and farm-related properties that are leased on a triple-net basis to tenants with a strong operating history and deep farming resources.
